sentences.en: A spangle used to ornament a dress or costume.
sentences.cn: 亮片用来装饰衣服或服装的金属片.

sentences.en: The red marks of the wings and tail's projections are the characteristics of spangle.
sentences.cn: 黑凤蝶的特点是红色的花纹和翅膀后边儿有突起.

sentences.en: Tiny shells spangle the profile of a young Roman woman of the second century A . D .
sentences.cn: 小小的贝壳装饰着一位 公元 二世纪的罗马妇女的侧面.

words.tran_cn: 用闪亮金属片装饰；使…闪烁（spangle的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 闪光的饰片，小而亮的东西
trans.tran_en: a small piece of shiny metal or plastic sewn onto clothes to give them a shining effect
to cover something with shiny points of light

trans.tran_cn: 用闪光饰片等小物件布满或装饰某物，使闪烁发光
